instructions_to_main_agent: IMPLEMENTATION: Use the 'Azeret Mono' font for all headings to establish the forensic identity.
LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento' grid for the Results Page. Do not stack everything vertically.
VISUALS: Add the 'scanline' CSS class to the analysis progress container.
COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components to remove rounded-xl and use rounded-sm or rounded-none for a stricter, more clinical look.
COLOR: Use the 'semantic' colors strictly for verdicts. Do not use generic green/red.
ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure high contrast for all text. The 'slate-500' labels must be legible.
DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all inputs, buttons, and result cards.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use gradients for text.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states.
Do not center-align the entire app.
